data.title: Live Music and Dining in Santiago
data.meta_description: Hard Rock Cafe Santiago is the place to be and be seen in Santiago, with seating for more than 250 guests, a patio bar, VIP room, indoor stage, and Rock Shop.
data.text:
Santiago, also known as Gran Santiago, is the capital of Chile, the country’s main metropolitan area, and home to a new Hard Rock Cafe. Our Santiago cafe is located in the largest shopping center in Chile, Costanera Center, surrounded by hotels and corporate offices. We’re located only 12 minutes from Arturo Merino Benítez International Airport and just 5 minutes walking from Tobalaba metro station and the most important conference centers in the city.

Experience Santiago

Santiago is a major hub for tourist activities, with many destinations accessible in the surrounding countryside, including ski resorts such as Valle Nevado and Portillo, valleys and wine routes, the coastal city of Viña del Mar, and Valparaiso. The tall and majestic Andes Mountains surround the city, offering gorgeous, snow-tipped views.
